## server

Starts a web server serving a REST API

### Synopsis

Starts a web server serving a REST API

For example:
linstor-iscsi server --addr=":8080"

```
server [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --addr string   Host and port as defined by http.ListenAndServe() (default ":8080")
  -h, --help          help for server
```
